description: Zero-dependency CMake formatter for VS Code. Formats CMakeLists.txt and .cmake files using CLion's proven formatting style - no Python, no external tools required. Pure TypeScript with 23 configuration options.
config.title: CLion CMake Format
config.useTabs.description: Use tabs for indentation instead of spaces
config.tabSize.description: Number of spaces equivalent to one tab (1-16)
config.continuationIndentSize.descriptio: Number of spaces for continuation indent (1-16)
config.spaceBeforeCommandDefinitionParen: Space before command definition parentheses (function, macro)
config.maxTrailingBlankLines.description: Maximum blank lines at end of file (>= 0, set large number to keep all)
config.lineLength.description: Maximum line length for formatted CMake files (0 = unlimited, minimum 30 for non-zero values)
config.alignControlFlowParentheses.descr: Align control flow parentheses when multi-line
config.enableProjectConfig.description: Enable reading project-level configuration from .cc-format.jsonc files. When disabled, only VS Code settings are used.
command.createConfig: CLion CMake Format: Create Default Config File
formatting.noChanges: No changes: content is already well-formatted
